====== Vocabulary

|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:opportunistic-observations-protocol-shapes:taxa-type:vocabulary`
|Label | Vocabulary
|Definition | The value of `tern:vocabulary` _MUST_ match the pattern `7ea12fed-6b87-4c20-9ab4-600b32ce15ec$`.
|Comment | IRI of `tern:vocabulary` in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ have the value `<https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/7ea12fed-6b87-4c20-9ab4-600b32ce15ec>`.

        `<https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/7ea12fed-6b87-4c20-9ab4-600b32ce15ec>` is the IRI for "Taxa type codes".
